Question
========

Als A = {4,5,6,8} en B = {3,5,7,8}, wat is dan de vereniging van A en B?

Answerlist
----------
* <em>A<\/em> &#8746; <em>B<\/em> = &#8709;
* <em>A<\/em> &#8746; <em>B<\/em> = {3,4,5,6,7,8}
* <em>A<\/em> &#8746; <em>B<\/em> = {3,4,5,6,8}
* <em>A<\/em> &#8746; <em>B<\/em> = {4,5,6,7,8}

Solution
========

The correct answer is  <em>A<\/em> &#8746; <em>B<\/em> = {3,4,5,6,7,8}
